title: Game doesnt load after champ select. PBE
body: After i updated to new client on pbe after champ select nothing seems to happen. The reconnect button doesnt do anything. I tried reinstalling but that didnt do anything. I dont know what to do. I have reported this issue at least 5 times already but the issue still remains. Pls help

replies.body: There may be a problem with your game files that failing to render the game.  Did you update to the new client?  Check out the steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to fix up your game files as well as making sure your drivers are up to date.  Hopefully, that will get you back in game.
